tool.name: Prepare FASTA file from gene IDs
tool.description: Retrieve the FASTA sequences for a set of gene IDs

param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Select a set of IMG taxon IDs

param.name: gene_history_item
param.label: List of IMG gene IDs (no header row, please!)

param.name: tab_sepd
param.label: Tab-separated data with a 'gene_oid' column containing IMG gene IDs

tool.help:
This tool takes a set of IMG gene IDs and retrieves their sequences in FASTA format. Gene IDs should be entered as a list of numbers, one line per ID. The output is suitable for tools that require a single FASTA file as input, such as ClustalW.
Here's a sample set of gene IDs to query::
